text: Richard Vincent "Rick" Mercer (born October 17, 1969) is a Canadian comedian who has been on shows like This Hour Has 22 Minutes and his own show The Rick Mercer Report. Rick Mercer is openly gay.Rick Mercer comes out again == References == Category:Canadian comedians Category:LGBT broadcasters Category:LGBT comedians Category:Canadian LGBT people Category:1969 births Category:Living people
title: Rick Mercer
